title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki - XWiki
content:
00:01 <abusenius> has quit  
00:29 <evalica> has quit  
01:13 <npm\_> has joined #xwiki  
01:14 <npm> has quit  
01:20 <npm\_> is now known as <npm>  
04:10 <cjdelisl1> has joined #xwiki  
04:12 <cjdelisle> has quit  
04:23 <DrLou> has quit  
07:47 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
08:09 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
08:16 <vmassol> has quit  
08:53 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
09:05 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
09:07 <vmassol> cjdelisl1: good morning  
09:08 <@cjdelisl1> good morning  
09:08 <vmassol> do you think you could set your name/company field for your github user so that they'll appear nicely on http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/Committers ? :)  
09:08 <vmassol> (I'm planning to move this script to the Hall of fame page)  
09:09 <@cjdelisl1> Am I an XWiki SAS developer?  
09:13 <@cjdelisl1> I would say no but I've never really needed a name, I've used the company name "as yet unnamed" quite a few times now ;)  
09:17 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
09:27 <sburjan`> has quit  
09:27 <sburjan`> has joined #xwiki  
09:30 <vmassol> cjdelisl1: good question! :) On http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/HallOfFame I had put "Self, partly sponsored by http://xwiki.com/"  
09:31 <@cjdelisl1> I'll leave it blank and write myself a note to make a website  
09:31 <vmassol> for github I'd say "self" for you  
09:31 <vmassol> or "Individual"  
09:31 <@cjdelisl1> that works  
09:57 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
10:12 <+tmortagne> anyone wants to be build manager this week ?  
10:15 <fmancinelli> has joined #xwiki  
10:16 <fmancinelli> has quit  
10:27 <+tmortagne> anyone ?  
10:34 <fmancine1li> has joined #xwiki  
10:34 <fmancine1li> is now known as <xenon75>  
10:35 <xenon75> has quit  
10:35 <fmancinelli> has joined #xwiki  
10:41 <vmassol> lots of committers are at count 3 on http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/BuildManagerRoster ….  
10:42 <+tmortagne> yep  
10:43 <+tmortagne> that's what I did not pointed any finger ;)  
10:43 <+tmortagne> s/what/why/  
10:43 <+tmortagne> but there is not much committers listed too  
10:43 <+tmortagne> some people never did their build manager duty  
10:44 <vmassol> yes however we should probably restrict to committers who are active every day. You need to be 100% present to be a build manager  
10:45 <vmassol> (which is why it's ok that not all committers are forced to do it IMO)  
10:54 <evalica> has quit  
11:00 <+tmortagne> vmassol: found a victim :)  
11:00 <vmassol> :)  
11:24 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
11:27 <vmassol> sdumitriu: just replied to your proposal  
11:28 <vmassol> (sorry it too so long from me)  
11:29 <vmassol> mflorea: would you have some time to look at http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-7045 ?  
11:38 <+mflorea> vmassol: I updated the XWiki.XWikiRights document, not the class, i.e. I just added an object to that document. I don't know why modifying a document (not the class) triggers an update of all objects of the type defined by that document. I'm not familiar with the code in com.xpn.xwiki.objects.\* so I don't think I'm the right one to look at this issue. Maybe sdumitriu can take a look. Note that from the description of the issue I deduce that the problem could  
11:40 <+mflorea> ttyl  
11:40 <mflorea> has quit  
11:44 <vmassol> hmmm he hasn't finished his sentence...  
11:44 <vmassol> :)  
11:46 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
12:06 <evalica> has quit  
12:09 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
12:23 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
12:24 <sburjan> has joined #xwiki  
13:36 <vmassol> has quit  
13:38 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
13:52 <DrLou> has joined #xwiki  
14:47 <vmassol> evalica: maybe we should reuse the color theme of XWiki watch for XEclipse or XOffice now? See http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/WebHome  
14:56 <+evalica> vmassol: just for the WebHome or should we also change the subwiki color theme?  
15:03 <vmassol> evalica: both  
15:26 <+evalica> vmassol: done  
15:27 <vmassol> evalica: great thanks  
15:28 <vmassol> :)

18:17 <vmassol> hmm should I keep http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Watch+Application and create http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Watch+ApplicationXWiki+Watch or should I merge both  
18:17 <vmassol> I think I'll merghe  
18:17 <vmassol> \*merge  
18:18 <sburjan> has quit  
18:18 <vmassol> starting now...  
18:32 <vmassol> hmm webdav seems to be attaching the images twice

19:06 <mflorea> has quit  
19:18 <vmassol> off to swimming training… bb in 1.5 hours...  
19:41 <sburjan> has quit  
19:49 <tmortagne> has quit  
19:50 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
19:59 <sburjan> has joined #xwiki  
20:15 <sburjan> has quit  
20:24 <lucaa> has quit  
20:34 <lpereira> has joined #xwiki  
20:46 <fragga> has joined #xwiki  
20:47 <fragga> salut !  
20:51 <fragga> has quit  
21:20 <fmancinelli> has joined #xwiki  
21:40 <sburjan\_> has joined #xwiki  
21:43 <sburjan`> has quit  
21:43 <sburjan\_> is now known as <sburjan`>  
21:53 <pturcotte> has joined #xwiki  
22:26 <vmassol> sdumitriu: seems we're missing release notes for XEM on http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/ReleaseNotes/WebHome  
22:26 <vmassol> quite a lot actually  
22:27 <vmassol> 3.1M2+  
22:27 <@sdumitriu> What was the consensus? Do we make milestone releases for XEM or just finals?  
22:27 <vmassol> for all releases now since we moved to Git AFAIK  
22:28 <@sdumitriu> OK  
22:28 <@sdumitriu> I'll take that into account  
22:28 <vmassol> basically for each release of XEM we did we should have a corresponding release note  
22:28 <vmassol> even if empty  
22:29 <vmassol> we could also not have it but mention it's the same as the XE release note  
22:29 <vmassol> but we need to mention something  
22:29 <vmassol> this template isn't too bad though: http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotesXEM31M1  
22:56 <vmassol> ok ready to delete the watch wiki....  
22:56 <vmassol> any regret anyone? :)  
22:56 <vmassol> the new page is ready at http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/XWiki+Watch  
22:57 <vmassol> s/new/salvaged information/  
22:59 <vmassol> alea jacta est  
23:22 <vmassol> has quit
